statements: SELECT * FROM TourSchedule
SELECT tour_id, tour_name FROM TourSchedule
SELECT * FROM TourSchedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT tour_name, end_date FROM TourSchedule ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT tour_id, tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM TourSchedule WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM TourSchedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC, tour_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT tour_name, COUNT(*) as total_tours FROM TourSchedule GROUP BY tour_name HAVING total_tours > 1 ORDER BY total_tours DESC
SELECT tour_id, tour_name FROM TourSchedule WHERE tour_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY tour_name
SELECT tour_name, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%M %d, %Y') as formatted_start_date FROM TourSchedule WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY formatted_start_date
SELECT * FROM TourSchedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM tour_schedules
SELECT tour_name, tour_date FROM tour_schedules
SELECT venue_name, venue_location, capacity FROM venues
SELECT tour_name, ticket_price FROM tour_schedules WHERE tour_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM venues ORDER BY venue_name DESC
SELECT * FROM tour_schedules WHERE tour_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT tour_name, ticket_price, venue_name FROM tour_schedules JOIN venues ON tour_schedules.venue_id = venues.venue_id WHERE venue_location = 'New York'
SELECT tour_id, tour_name, tour_date, venue_name, ticket_price FROM tour_schedules JOIN venues ON tour_schedules.venue_id = venues.venue_id ORDER BY tour_date DESC
SELECT AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_price, MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_price FROM tour_schedules
SELECT venue_name, COUNT(tour_id) AS total_tours FROM tour_schedules JOIN venues ON tour_schedules.venue_id = venues.venue_id GROUP BY venue_name HAVING total_tours > 3
SELECT * FROM Tour_Schedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM Tour_Schedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT venue_name, address FROM Venues WHERE capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT event_id, ticket_quantity, total_price FROM Ticket_Sales WHERE total_price > 500 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time, ticket_price FROM Tour_Schedule WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time, ticket_price FROM Tour_Schedule;
SELECT * FROM Venues WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT transaction_id, event_id, ticket_quantity, total_price, transaction_date FROM Ticket_Sales WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT venue_name, address FROM Venues ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time, ticket_price FROM Tour_Schedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tour_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT tour_id, tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM tour_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT tour_name, end_date FROM tour_schedule WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venues WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY venue_name;
SELECT tour_id, SUM(attendance_count) AS total_attendance FROM attendance GROUP BY tour_id;
SELECT * FROM tour_schedule WHERE tour_id = 1;
SELECT tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM tour_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venues WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, sale_date, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT tour_name, venue_name, attendance_count FROM tour_schedule JOIN attendance ON tour_schedule.tour_id = attendance.tour_id JOIN venues ON attendance.venue_id = venues.venue_id ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM tour_schedule;
SELECT tour_name, artist_name, tour_date FROM tour_schedule WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT tour_name, tour_date, venue_name, location FROM tour_schedule JOIN venue ON tour_schedule.venue_id = venue.venue_id;
SELECT artist_name, tour_date, quantity FROM tour_schedule JOIN ticket_sales ON tour_schedule.tour_id = ticket_sales.tour_id;
SELECT * FROM event_history ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tour_schedule ORDER BY tour_date DESC, tour_id;
SELECT tour_name, artist_name, venue_id FROM tour_schedule WHERE tour_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tour_name, count(*) as total_attendance FROM tour_schedule JOIN attendance ON tour_schedule.tour_id = attendance.tour_id GROUP BY tour_name ORDER BY total_attendance DESC;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM venue WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance_count FROM event_history WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY attendance_count DESC, event_date DESC;
